select id, v.userid, videoname, videotype, videourl, createdate, isvalid, introduction, musicid, permission, viewcount, sharecount, circleid, status, videopictureurl, videopicturename, praisecount from b_praise_td p LEFT JOIN b_video_td v on p.videoid=v.id where p.userid=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and v.permission='01' order by p.createtime desc
